title: Hilton Short Hills
content:
Does this bodoni ring a bell? (Don't mind the crappy scaling of the S)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [HiltonShortHillsLogo2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20141114112237/http:/typophile.com/files/HiltonShortHillsLogo2.jpg) | 7.44 KB |
author: typotect

comments.content:
Sorry Karl... I didn´t read your post... I just jumped right on to the attached image...  
I guess I have finally disqualified myself in this ID board :-(
I will guess its a custom drawing of a Bodoni like face. Look at the square dot on the I (yuck). I would do a Google search for when this logo was developed I bet its pretty old.

Nicolai, I wouldn't _dream_ of disqualifying anyone, and certainly not you. You have proven your worth on the Type ID Board time and again. You earned a heck of a lot of credits with me. Don't you go anywhere!
